attributes.action: Deliver a more honest appriasal of the PM's time in office rather than the one published in December 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM promised us more transparnecy, less spin and a determintaion to serve the people when he took office in June. What has happened has been the complete opposite. The petition has an objective to force the PM to acknowledge that his words were sheer folly.

rejection.details: Comments on the Downing Street website should be emailed to "team@petitions.pm.gov.uk"
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
